idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Play Tom and Shaker continuously for background music 
for i in range(0, 32): # 32 sets of notes 
    playNote(8, beats = 1) #type of notes and duration of beat 
    playNote(3, beats = 1)
    playNote(8, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(8, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(3, beats = 1)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Play melody of Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge (DDLJ) tune on acoustic guitar
for i in range(0, 32): # 32 sets of notes 
    playNote(64, beats = 1) # play note E for 1 beat 
    playNote(64, beats = 1) # play note E for 1 beat 
    playNote(64, beats = 1) # play note E for 1 beat 
    playNote(71, beats = 1) # play note B for 1 beat 
    playNote(69, beats = 1) # play note A for 1 beat 
    playNote(71, beats = 1)
    playNote(67, beats = 1)
    playNote(69, beats = 1.2)
    playNote(72, beats = 1.2)
    playNote(71, beats = 4)
    playNote(64, beats = 1)
    playNote(64, beats = 1)
    playNote(64, beats = 1)
    playNote(71, beats = 1)
    playNote(69, beats = 1)
    playNote(71, beats = 1)
    playNote(67, beats = 1)
    playNote(69, beats = 1)
    playNote(67, beats = 1)
    playNote(66, beats = 4)
    playNote(64, beats = 1)
    playNote(66, beats = 1)
    playNote(62, beats = 1.3)
    playNote(64, beats = 1)
    playNote(66, beats = 1)
    playNote(62, beats = 1.3)
    playNote(64, beats = 1)
    playNote(67, beats = 1)
    playNote(66, beats = 2)
    playNote(64, beats = 1)
    playNote(66, beats = 1)
    playNote(62, beats = 1.3)
    playNote(64, beats = 1)
    playNote(66, beats = 1)
    playNote(62, beats = 1.3)
    playNote(67, beats = 1)
    playNote(66, beats = 1)
    playNote(64, beats = 2)
    rest(4) # pause beat for 4 beats
